fullText:
Shift the Field

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, warlord, Battlefront Leader class feature
Benefit: Your battlefront shift power becomes a close burst 5 and targets you and each ally in the burst.


Update (4/13/2010)
In the Benefit entry, replace “battlefield shift” with “battlefront shift.”

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 145.
name: Shift the Field

benefit: Your battlefront shift power becomes a close burst 5 and targets you and each ally in the burst.
